2164.subject: MPA
2164.descrlong:
Student bands and solo artists develop their sound, song writing, production skills, stage presence, and other assets required to be successful in the music business. Students are required to record and produce. Students provide own instruments. Music Majors Only. (Offered spring semester.)

[Prereq: (MPA 102 and Music Majors Only) or (Equivalent and Instructor Consent)]
